# instacart-orders

> Export your Instacart order history to JSON, CSV, or text.

## Install

```
brew tap mike-vincent/instacart-order-history-scraper
brew install instacart-orders
```

## Usage

```
instacart-orders --session "SESSION_COOKIE"
instacart-orders --session "COOKIE" --months 6 --format csv
```

## Options

- `--session, -s` - Instacart session cookie (required)
- `--months N` - Last N months
- `--days N` - Last N days
- `--since YYYY-MM-DD` - Since date
- `--format json|csv|text` - Output format
- `-o FILE` - Output file
- `-q` - Quiet mode

https://github.com/mike-vincent
